about_the_game:
Please, do not buy soundtrack unless you really wish to support the developer. You can listen to music just by downloading a demo of the game and entering "dev_menu" in developer console that you can open by pressing [`]/[~] button. Have fun!

Experience an intense combat or certain silent moments of this game with no need to launch it. From one track to another, You go through the story of 00::A008.
